title: Does korean locale work on the old client anymore?
body:
Does anyone know how to change the old client locale to korean becuase everytime I try to change it, that thing pops up and it blocks the client from downloading the files.
It used to work a while ago, but this was on older patches

replies.body: Each region has its own set of languages that it uses. You can switch between these on the login screen, but only the ones that are available for the region you're on. Check out our [Language Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) so you can know which languages are an option for you.
